html:
2.5.18  11:12 pm   Are people stupid

     yes, and smart

2.5.18  9:57 pm   do you condone the usage of internet browsers and other computer programs?

     yes, as long as you are using them with high morals

2.5.18  9:43 pm   If u were able to make a country, what would it be called?

     that depends what country it is

2.5.18  9:26 pm   don't you ever just want to scream?

     yes

      you seem too cool

2.5.18  9:22 pm   can you make a version of your video suitable for school student?

     my videos have been watched and enjoyed by millions of school students, just the way they are

2.5.18  9:18 pm   are u white?

     i will check

2.5.18  9:16 pm   what do you think?

     thoughts, etc

2.5.18  9:14 pm   What do you think of the following rap: Listen, son I don't wanna see ya / hanging round at my pizzeria
 

     you didn't rap it, you just wrote the words down. i don't know what it sounds like

2.5.18  8:21 pm   how do you decide which songs you want to have a music video?

     as of last july i decided that all new songs must have a video with them. i may change my mind again in the future but that's just how i'm doing it now

2.5.18  7:57 pm   quick how do i make a bird

     the best birds are made by birds

2.5.18  7:49 pm   I think it's pretty annoying when people ask you about capital letters because first of all: you do use them sometimes and second of all: who cares???

     that's true. another interesting thing you may notice is that half the people asking the questions actually don't use them

2.5.18  7:42 pm   Did you know that the UW campus is the drunkest campus in America and also how do you feel about that?

     that's interesting, i would have thought they would have been in 2nd or 3rd place. but in any case, congrats

2.5.18  7:30 pm   do you like putting lemons in your eyes as a recreational activity?

     no

2.5.18  7:10 pm   Have you ever considered putting a note at the top of this page that says "I use capital letters sometimes so stop asking me about it"?

     how about just having some capital letters at the top of the page, which there already are

2.5.18  6:53 pm   Why do I fell like I have so much potential, yet I can't use it? I just feel so useless (not in a suicidal way or anything). Can you help? Just keep doing what you're doing anyways.

     ah, it looks like you are playing a hot round of everyone's favourite game, 'how do i do all the stuff i know i can do some how.' the game is challenging, but that's what makes it such a classic, and keeps people coming back for more

2.5.18  6:48 pm   Any tips on not making a complete and utter fool of myself every single day?

     do something a little different each day, and keep a log book. if you end up making a fool out of yourself every day then at least you will have a big book of ways to make a fool out of yourself, which sounds like a pretty good book, probably a best seller

2.5.18  6:47 pm   what is the most asked question to you?

     i can't tell you

2.5.18  6:43 pm   how do you feel about the bill wurtz copycats?

     i don't spend any time thinking about them, because i am busy being the original

2.5.18  6:43 pm   are u from the future?

     no, but i am going there

2.5.18  6:41 pm   What do you think of experimentation?  

     seems legit

2.5.18  5:14 pm   What's your thoughts on corporate social media accounts trying to be hip with the kids?

     seems legit

2.5.18  4:41 pm   what are your new years questions?

     what year is it

2.5.18  4:41 pm   If you could rename one common item, what item would it be, and what would you name it?

     i would name a car a truck

2.5.18  4:40 pm   What is your favorite Lays flavour?

     circus unicycle

2.5.18  4:29 pm   face reveal?

     never

2.5.18  4:26 pm   what do u like

      the possibilities, of all the different things to like

2.5.18  4:25 pm   what makes something ah, #relatable 

     you just know it when it has that swag, and it gives you that ah-ha moment. #whatsyourahhamoment

2.5.18  4:19 pm   will the new video include your face

     yes

2.5.18  3:30 pm   should we nuke mexico

     no

     and why

     it's not nice

     thnx

2.5.18  3:14 pm   What would you do as king for a day?

     see if i can make myself king for the following day as well

2.5.18  2:39 pm   is love a strong word

     yes and no

2.5.18  2:08 pm   Bill can you do a face reveal

     never

2.5.18  2:06 pm   where did numbers come from?

     they have always been everywhere

2.5.18  1:26 pm   Have you ever tried witchcraft?

     yes, it never seems to work

2.5.18  1:14 pm   what do you think about computers?

     i think they are doing a great job

2.5.18  1:06 pm   What is your thoughts on food?

     it is helpful, and useful

2.5.18  12:36 pm   Why is it so hard to socialize 

     i think socialization is best served as a side dish

2.5.18  12:23 pm   how many bees have you seen?

     just a few, here and there

2.5.18  12:19 pm   are you secretly trying to teach us existential philosophy from the 19th and 20th century in your songs

     no

2.5.18  11:27 am   Do you ever resent the level of public scrutiny and (perhaps perceived) responsibility that comes with reaching a larger audience?

     sure

     Or do you embrace it?

     yes

     The idea of being "famous" or deprived of my anonymity in any sense has always been kind of terrifying to me.

2.5.18  11:09 am   Am I allowed to use some of your music in my videos? It's super good.

     i think you should make your own music! or use someone else's music, besides mine. my music was made for my videos

2.5.18  10:52 am   Do you know a ghost?

     i have many friends who are ghosts, and let me just say, i think they are phenomenal people, and i have nothing but the utmost respect for ghosts and the ghost community

2.5.18  10:05 am   what do you think of (song name) but every time it says(word) it gets faster?

     it makes me wonder what people did for fun before that was invented

2.5.18  10:04 am   stop being so mormon, nigga

     i will see what i can do

2.5.18  9:30 am   oh darn, i forgot how to speak english

     ah, #relatable

2.5.18  9:26 am   for me, music is life. i can't live without it. but whenever I try making music, it's shit. do you think I'm wasting my time or shall I keep practicing even if I'll go nowhere as to understanding this "theory"?

     what theory

2.5.18  8:07 am   could you perhaps do a reveal of your foot

     sure

2.5.18  7:57 am   why do we never see you slapping your bass in any music video of yours?

     because i don't do it in the music

2.5.18  7:01 am   When I'm writing a song I usually try to make sure the whole lyrics are about the same subject, because if I don't, there are a million things I can write about and I feel lost. How come you don't?

     it doesn't feel like i have to

2.5.18  5:13 am   why would i ask a question?

     why did you
